name: Transitions
description: This component allows the animate mounting and unmounting of page elements

properties.name: variant
properties.label: Variant
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to choose a variant of transition

properties.name: duration
properties.label: Duration (ms)
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine duration of transition (ms)

properties.name: dynamicContent
properties.label: Dynamic Content
properties.settingTooltip: Enable if your content is dynamic. See the component's documentation for details

eventHandlers.name: onMounted
eventHandlers.label: On Mounted
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered after the component is mounted and appeared on the page

eventHandlers.name: onUnmounted
eventHandlers.label: On Unmounted
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered before the component is unmounted and destroyed

eventHandlers.name: onEndAnimation
eventHandlers.label: On End Animation
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered after the animation finishes

eventHandlers.name: onStartAnimation
eventHandlers.label: On Start Animation
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when the animation started
